refnamediv.refpurpose: Provides a delay of the specified time before the next command will be processed.

refsection.para: Provides a delay of the specified time before the next command will be processed.
The example shows the use of the delay command to delay the next command by the specified time.

info.title: Delay the next command by a specified amount of time.

example.para: Delays the next command for 5 seconds.
